about_the_game:
Dive into a world where every jump, slide, and dash feels incredibly satisfying. Vista World offers an immersive platforming experience that keeps you on the edge of your seat with its captivating gameplay and stunning visuals.

Unleash your creativity with our intuitive level editor. Build intricate levels from scratch, place traps, enemies, and obstacles, and share your creations with the community. The only limit is your imagination!

Join a vibrant community of creators and players. Design your own levels, share them with friends, and explore an ever-growing library of user-generated content. The adventure never ends in Vista World.

Experience the smoothest and most responsive controls in a platformer. Every movement is designed to be fluid and precise, giving you complete control over your character as you navigate through challenging environments.

Face off against a variety of dynamic enemies and navigate through perilous traps. Each encounter is designed to test your skills and keep you engaged, ensuring that no two levels feel the same.

Embark on an epic journey through a meticulously crafted story mode. Discover the secrets of Vista World as you progress through beautifully designed levels, each with its own unique challenges and surprises.

Unlock and master a vast array of abilities that enhance your gameplay. From gravity manipulating canned vegetables to hang gliding soap bubbles, each ability adds a new layer of depth and excitement to your platforming adventure.

name: Vista World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3550H @ s.10 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX Vega 8 Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum tested requirements, lesser specs may also function
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6400 CPU @ 2.70 GHz
  • Memory: 24 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Vista World is an engaging 3D platformer with a sandbox-style level editor. Create, share, and explore endless levels. Enjoy the incredibly smooth movement, dynamic enemies, engaging traps, a hand-crafted story mode, and a vast array of abilities that augment gameplay. What are you waiting for?
